turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Deb, I have a taste for Starbucks today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh great! Would you like me to pick up something for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Would you mind?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, not all. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me think... so many flavors.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I agree. I've tried many flavors.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh great! I've only had one or two different flavors.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Although I've tried many, I only have a few favorites.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Would like to have a drink on me today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh no, that's okay.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, it's my pleasure. Please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, thanks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great! I'm not sure if I want hot or cold today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I think I'll have cold since I had hot yesterday.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would say both but I don't it would be a good idea today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're right about that.... way too much sugar.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I would like a large Cappuccino

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, how would you like it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A shot of espresso topped with a deep layer of foamed milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would like any extra sweetener

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I have a few packets of sugar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, is that all you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually I think I'll have some iced lemon loaf cake and a cinnamon raisin bagel.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Really? Lol

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, ma'am. I'll take one home.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, maybe I'll get a bagel also.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, get it if you want. Okay, where are you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm downtown already so I'll stop at Starbucks on 4th & Wisconsin Ave.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great! It's almost no waiting at that store. I love it there. See you soon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! I'm walking in the door and I should be there shortly.
